question_text: Your organization is undergoing major transformation. Which role would you take?
scenario: The company needs to adapt to new market conditions and is forming cross-functional teams to lead different aspects of the change.

options.text: Redesigning company culture and brand identity
Analyzing market data and developing strategies
Managing change communication and team morale

question_text: You have the opportunity to start a new division. What would it focus on?
scenario: Your company is investing in new ventures and you can propose and lead a new division.

options.text: Corporate social responsibility and community partnerships
